Sgwrs Cymraeg
Jac

Sali, wyt ti wedi clywed am y perchnogion newydd o America sydd wedi prynu Wrexham AFC?

Sali, have you heard about the new American owners who bought Wrexham AFC?
Sali

Ydw, mae'n ddiddorol iawn! Sut mae hynny'n effeithio'r clwb, wyt ti'n meddwl?

Yes, it's very interesting! How does that affect the club, do you think?
Jac

Mae'n sôn am fuddsoddi mewn adnoddau, hyfforddi a chyfleusterau i wella'r clwb. Gallai hyn arwain at lwyddiant mawr yn y dyfodol.

They're talking about investing in resources, training, and facilities to improve the club. This could lead to great success in the future.
Sali

Gobeithio y bydd hynny'n wir. Mae'n braf gweld buddsoddiad yn ein clwb lleol.

Hopefully that's true. It's nice to see investment in our local club.
Jac

Hefyd, mae'r perchnogion newydd wedi denu sylw o'r wasg a'r cyfryngau. Gallai hynny helpu i godi proffil Wrexham AFC yn rhyngwladol.

Also, the new owners have attracted attention from the press and media. This could help raise the profile of Wrexham AFC internationally.
Sali

Yn wir, mae hynny'n bwynt da. Mae'n bosibl y bydd y clwb yn denu chwaraewyr talentog a noddwyr mawr.

That's true, it's a good point. The club might attract talented players and big sponsors.
Jac

Yn y cyfamser, mae'n bwysig i gefnogwyr Wrexham gefnogi'r clwb drwy fynychu gemau a chefnogi'r tîm.

In the meantime, it's important for Wrexham supporters to support the club by attending games and supporting the team.
Sali

Cytuno'n llwyr. Gadewch i ni fynd i'r gêm nesaf ynghyd, a chefnogi Wrexham AFC i lwyddiant!

Totally agree. Let's go to the next game together and support Wrexham AFC to success!
